      • getOptionalValue

        public Optional<ImmutableList<T>> getOptionalValue()
        Description copied from interface: TypeCoercer
        Get a value suitable for an Optional field. This will typically be Optional.absent(), but may be some other value, such as an empty collection.
        Returns:
        A value suitable for fields of type Optional when no value has been set.
